categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Shiden was a female Human Jedi Master serving the Jedi Order and the Galactic Republic during the Cold War with the Sith Empire.

A Force-sensitive Human, Shiden was trained in the ways of the Force by the Jedi Order, eventually attaining the rank of Jedi Master. During the Cold War, Master Shiden resided on the ancestral Jedi homeworld Tython with the rest of the Order where she traded specialty goods at the Temple.
Shiden was removed from the game in update 6.2 of Star Wars: The Old Republic: Onslaught.
